short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the InventoryBase report audio player with your keyboard media keys or external devices, like pedals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable global media key shortcuts to control the InventoryBase Audio Player for playing back audio dictations
